titles.title: Commemorating the 50th anniversary of the establishment of the Federal Protective Service, and recognizing their service to our Nation.
FPS 50th Anniversary Resolution
Federal Protective Service 50th Anniversary Resolution
FPS 50th Anniversary Resolution

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on Transportation and Infrastructure.
Referred to the Subcommittee on Economic Development, Public Buildings, and Emergency Management.

committee.name: House Transportation and Infrastructure
committee.subcommittee: Economic Development, Public Buildings, and Emergency Management

bill.summary:
Federal Protective Service 50th Anniversary Resolution or the FPS 50th Anniversary Resolution
This resolution recognizes the 50th anniversary of the establishment of the Federal Protective Service and the role it plays in protecting the people and property of the federal government.
